mug noun [C]
(CUP)
Add to word list
Add to word list
A2 a large cup with straight sides used for hot drinks: I made myself a large mug of cocoa (= enough to fill a mug) and went to bed.
Ragnar Schmuck/GettyImages beer mug mainly US
a heavy glass with a handle and usually with patterns cut into its side, out of which you drink beer: We all raised our wine glasses and beer mugs to toast the happy couple.
